message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects the exceptional quality and potential benefits of the product while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I recognize the value of your product, but the price point is a bit high for me at the moment.  I'd be willing to purchase it for $900,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with a price of $1,050,000. This price still allows us to maintain a fair profit margin while reflecting the value we believe the product holds for you. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  While I see the value in your product,  $975,000 is the highest I'm willing to go.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of our product. In light of this, I am prepared to consider an offer closer to your suggested price. Therefore, I propose a final price of $1,025,000 for the product. This price still maintains a reasonable profit margin for us while acknowledging your budget constraints. I hope this offer is acceptable and we can conclude this transaction satisfactorily.
